text:
Man:
HEY, GREAT THINGS ARE HAPPENING

HERE AT THE UNITED PEOPLE'S
RELIEF TELETHON THANKS TO YOU

LOOK WHO WE HAVE WITH US
THIS HOUR,

I WISH YOU COULD FEEL
THE LOVE IN THIS ROOM.

WELL, LET'S SEE
HOW WE'RE DOING.

I HAVE A PLEDGE
FOR $300, COLIN.

AND I'VE GOT TEARS
IN MY EYES.

WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK
BUT YOU KEEP CALLING.

HEY, WHAT'S UP.
IT'S HANNAH MONTANA.

WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE
TO GIVE?

I'D LIKE TO GIVE
YOU SINGING LESSONS.

JUST HEARD YOUR
NEW SINGLE. OUCH.

WELL, I JUST HEARD YOURS
AND I THOUGHT IT WAS FANTASTIC.

YEAH. MY BROTHER
AT SOME BAD CATFISH,

SO WE PLAYED IT FOR HIM
TO INDUCE VOMITING.

IT WAS LIKE BAM!
INSTANT PUKE!

I HATE YOU.
LIKE I CARE.

I'LL TELL YOU WHAT
I'D LIKE TO STUFF.

MILES, DON'T LET HER
PUSH YOUR BUTTONS.

YOU'RE RIGHT. MY LIFE
IS COMPLICATED ENOUGH.

THE LAST THING I NEED
IS MORE DRAMA.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP
♪ YOU GET THE LIMO OUT FRONT ♪

♪ HOTTEST STYLES, EVERY SHOE,
EVERY COLOR ♪

♪ YEAH, WHEN YOU'RE FAMOUS,
IT CAN BE KINDA FUN ♪

♪ IT'S REALLY YOU,
BUT NO ONE EVER DISCOVERS ♪

♪ WHO WOULD HAVE THOUGHT
THAT A GIRL LIKE ME ♪

♪ YOU GET THE BEST
OF BOTH WORLDS ♪

♪ CHILL IT OUT,
TAKE IT SLOW ♪
♪ THEN YOU ROCK OUT THE SHOW ♪

♪ YOU GET THE BEST
OF BOTH WORLDS ♪

♪ AND YOU KNOW THAT
IT'S THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS

OH, MAN. HE WANTS TO
GET BACK TOGETHER WITH ME.

DON'T YOU DARE LEAVE ME
ALONE WITH HIM.

WHY WOULD I LEAVE
MY LITTLE SISTER

WHEN SHE AND HER EX
ARE GONNA TALK ABOUT

YOU HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE
TO FORGET ABOUT ME.

YOUR LIFE FEELS EMPTY
WITHOUT ME.

YOU SEE MY FACE
EVERYWHERE YOU LOOK

AND YOU'VE COME
BACK TO SAY--

I JUST WANT
TO BE FRIENDS.

BIG BLONDE SACK OF
DRAMA SAY WHAT?

AND JUST BECAUSE THINGS
DIDN'T WORK OUT BETWEEN US

DOESN'T MEAN
WE CAN'T STILL BE
IN EACH OTHER'S LIVES.

SO...YOU'RE NOT
INTO ME AT ALL?

I MEAN, COME ON,
IT'S ONLY BEEN
A COUPLE FO MONTHS.

WHAT ARE YOU,
MADE OF STONE?

MILEY, IF THIS IS
TOO HARD FOR YOU--

FOR ME? OH, PUH...
ARE YOU KIDDING.

I MEAN,
THIS IS SO GREAT.

I WOULD LOVE
TO BE FRIENDS.

OH, YEAH, THIS IS--
THIS IS GREAT.

LOOKS LIKE SOMEBODY
GOT UP ON THE WRONG SIDE

OF THE HAMSTER WHEEL
THIS MORNING.

THE WATER'S OUT
AT MY HOUSE

AND I HAVEN'T SHOWERED
IN TWO DAYS.

SO? WE'RE GUYS.
WE'RE NOT SUPPOSED
TO SHOWER EVERY DAY.

THAT'S WHAT MAGAZINE
COLOGNE SAMPLES ARE FOR.

YOU PUT A COUPLE OF THESE
IN YOUR POCKETS,

OH, LIKE YOU'VE
NEVER DONE IT.

EW! WHAT KIND OF
COLOGNE IS THIS?

IT'S NOT. I SPILLED PICKLE JUICE
ON IT AN HOUR AGO.

HOO HOO!
YOU JUST GOT PO'd.

DUDE, GET OVER IT.
IT'S ONLY TWO DAYS.

I WISH. THE PLUMBER SAID
OUR WATER'S GONNA BE OUT

GROW UP AND RELEASE
YOUR INNER MAN STINK.

I BET YOU GUYS
FREE HOT DOGS FOR A MONTH

THAT YOU GUYS CAN'T GO
WITHOUT SHOWERING...

UNTIL THEY TURN
MY WATER BACK ON.

IT'S GONNA BE LIKE TAKING CANDY
FROM A STANKY BABY.

IF WE LOSE,
WHAT DO WE GET?

THE SATISFACTION OF LOOKING
AT YOU GUYS AND SAYING,

OH, DID I MENTION
I HAVEN'T BRUSHED
MY TEETH EITHER?

YEAH, WE KIND OF
FIGURED THAT OUT.

DUDE, I THINK I GOT
SOME IN MY MOUTH.

AND CURRENT TEEN SCREEN
SENSATION, JAKE RYAN!

ISN'T HE?
ISN'T HE? HE IS.

SO, JAKE,
YOU'RE BACK IN TOWN.

YOU'RE HERE TO SHOOT
A COUPLE OF SCENES

YOU BETTER PUT YOUR
PHASERS ON FUN.

I'M REALLY GLAD TO HAVE
A FEW DAYS IN L.A.

BEFORE WE GO TO ANTARCTICA
TO DO THE REST OF THE MOVIE.

YOU KNOW, IT GIVES ME
A CHANCE TO SPEND SOME TIME

THERE IS NO WAY
YOU AND HEARTBREAK JAKE
CAN BE FRIENDS.

YOU KNOW WHAT?
I THINK BEING
FRIENDS

IS THE BEST THING
THAT'S EVER HAPPENED
TO US.

I MEAN, WE CAN
FINALLY HANG OUT

WITHOUT ANY OF THAT
RELATIONSHIP JUNK.

IT'S SO SIMPLE.
NO MORE INSECURITY

AND I'M SO EXCITED
TO INTRODUCE

THAT I'LL BE KISSING
FOR THE NEXT 8 WEEKS.

PUT YOUR HANDS TOGETHER
FOR MY BEAUTIFUL CO-STAR
MIKAYLA!

WELL,
THAT'S OUR SHOW
FOR TODAY.

WHEN YOUR ALARM CLOCK
WILL RING AND SAY...

THANK YOU SO MUCH
FOR HAVING US.

OH, YOU'RE WELCOME.
YOU'RE VERY WELCOME.

YES, YOU ARE.
OH, YES, YOU ARE.

WENDY, YOU DON'T
HAVE TO YELL.

OH, I KNOW.
IT TAKES ME 20 MINUTES

AFTER EVERY SHOW
TO STOP TALKING LIKE THIS.

IT DOES. IT REALLY DOES.
IT REALLY DOES.

HEY, SO WHAT DID
YOU THINK?

YEAH, I THOUGHT ABOUT
ASKING, YOU KNOW,

HANNAH MONTANA
TO PLAY MY LOVE INTEREST,

BUT I DIDN'T WANT TO
DO ANYTHING THAT MIGHT
RISK THE NEW FRIENDSHIP.

A LITTLE LATE
FOR THAT,
PRETTY BOY.

SO YOU WENT WITH MIKAYLA
INSTEAD OF ASKING ME

BECAUSE YOU DIDN'T WANT
TO RISK OUR NEW FRIENDSHIP?

EXACTLY. I MEAN,
HOW AWKWARD WOULD THAT BE?

THE ALIEN BABE AND I KISS
FROM ONE END OF THE UNIVERSE
TO THE OTHER.

MILEY, I MEAN, YOU'RE
NOT JEALOUS, ARE YOU?

ARE YOU KIDDING?
I'M HAPPY FOR YOU,

YOU GET ANY HAPPIER,
YOU'RE GONNA BREAK MY ARM.

AND I KNOW
WHO YOU ARE.

RIGHT.
WE NEVER MET OR ANYTHING.

THERE'S A COUPLE OF GUYS
FROM THE CREW

WHO WERE WONDERING IF THEY
COULD GET A PICTURE WITH YOU.

WELL, I'M NOT
GONNA SAY NO TO THAT.

I JUST WANT YOU TO KNOW
HOW AMAZING I THINK YOU ARE.

I COULD NEVER WATCH
MY EX-BOYFRIEND

SMACKING ON ANOTHER GIRL
AND STAY FRIENDS WITH HIM.

I AM AMAZING.
AND IT'S JUST A MOVIE, RIGHT?

I MEAN, COME ON,
HE'S BEYOND CUTE.

I CAN'T BELIEVE
YOU DUMPED HIM.

YEP, SHE'S JUST
A LITTLE DUMPSTER.

I'M ALREADY WORKING
ON OUR CELEBRITY
COUPLE NAMES.

RIGHT NOW IT'S BETWEEN
JAKAYLA AND MIKAKE.

TOO BAD YOU'RE NOT OLD ENOUGH
FOR A DONALD TRUMP.

MAN, THAT'S TOO BAD
YOU'RE NOT FAMOUS, TOO.

WE COULD'VE BEEN SUCH
GOOD FRIENDS.

RELAX. SO WHAT
IF SHE'S INTO HIM?

HE MAY NOT EVEN
LIKE HER.

AND YOUR SNUGGLE OPTIONS
ARE BETWEEN A PENGUIN
AND HER.

IF I TELL HIM THAT
I HATE MIKAYLA,

HE'LL THINK IT'S
BECAUSE I'M JEALOUS.

BUT YOU DO HATE HER
AND YOU ARE JEALOUS.

IT'S MY JOB TO GET
MIKAYLA FIRED OFF
THAT SET

BEFORE THEY START
SHARING MUKLUKS
IN ANTARCTICA.

PLEASE TELL ME YOUR PLAN
DOESN'T INVOLVE ME.

COME ON, DAD.
THIS IS STUPID.

CAN I COME BACK
IN THE HOUSE NOW?

YOU SMELL WORSE THAN
THAT WEEK-OLD SARDINE

UNCLE EARL FOUND
IN HIS FAT FOLD

WHEN HE WAS LOOKING
FOR THE REMOTE.

WENT RIGHT THROUGH
THE STINK ZONE.

OH, HEY, GUYS.
HEY, THANKS FOR
COMING BY?

WE JUST WANTED TO WISH YOU LUCK
ON YOUR FIRST DAY OF FILMING

'CAUSE, YOU KNOW,
THAT'S WHAT FRIENDS DO.

OH, WE JUST WANTED
TO WISH HER LUCK.

IT'S NOT LIKE WE'RE
HERE TO GET HER FIRED
OR ANYTHING.

WELL, GOOD LUCK.
BREAK A LEG.
GOTTA GO. BYE.

THEN STOP PUTTING ME
UNDER PRESSURE.

MIKAYLA DEMANDED EXTRA CASHEWS
IN HER TRAIL MIX.

AND IF THERE ISN'T
A BOATLOAD OF CURVY NUTS

YOU'RE GONNA BE LOOKING FOR
A NEW ALIEN BABE, OK?

I THOUGHT THIS WAS
A CLOSED SET!

IT'S OK, MARGO.
THESE ARE JAKE'S
FRIENDS.

OH, HO! HI.
IT'S SO NICE TO MEET YA!

LISTEN, MISTER,
WE HAD A CONTRACT,

IF I GET HOME
AND YOUR BEDROOM
IS NOT CLEAN,

SO, GUYS, WHAT DO YOU
THINK OF MY COSTUME?

KISS ME, ROGER BUCKS,
AS IF THE FATE OF THE GALAXY

DEPENDED ON IT,
BECAUSE IT DOES.

YOU KNOW WHO WOULD
LIKE THAT? JOHNNY DEPP.

YEAH, WE WERE JUST
TALKING TO HIM,

AND HE SAID HE REALLY
WANTED TO MEET YOU.

SAY HI TO JOHNNY
FOR ME!

AT LEAST YOU CAN
RUN AWAY FROM IT.

WHEN DID YOUR
WATER GO BACK ON?

AND NOW, THANKS
TO YOUR MAN STINK,

I'M THE ONLY SWEET-SMELLING
GUY WITHIN MILES OF THIS PLACE.

AND YOU'RE HAPPY ABOUT
THAT BECAUSE...

EXCUSE ME.
I'M LOOKING FOR
THE PHOTO SHOOT.

OH, THE ONE FOR THE...
SWIMSUIT CALENDAR?

IT WAS LIKE TAKING CANDY
FROM TWO STANKY BABIES.

ARE YOU SURE
THIS IS GONNA WORK?

IT WILL. AS SOON AS
I'M DONE BEING MIKAYLA,

YOU ARE SO EVIL.
LIKE YOU REALLY
ARE MIKAYLA.

[ELECTRONIC ALIEN VOICE]
THANK YOU. HA HA!

OH, WOW, MIKAYLA,
YOU LOOK GREAT.

OH, AND I HAVE
TO KISS YOU.

WELL, I GUESS THAT'S
WHY THEY CALL IT ACTING.

BUT IT WOULD REALLY HELP ME
IF YOU STOP SLAMMING ME.

AND IT WOULD REALLY HELP ME
IF YOU WERE BETTER-LOOKING.

OK, KIDS, NOW,
IN THIS SCENE,

AND I KNOW
THEY'RE NOT REAL,

ARE KIND OF GIVING ME
THE HEEBIE JEEBIES.

OK, LET'S SHOOT THIS SUCKER
AND TAIL OUT OF HERE, OK?

WE'VE GOT TWO MINUTES
TO DESTROY THESE CLONES.

BUT DON'T WORRY,
ROGER BUCKS HAS A PLAN.

HA. I HOPE IT INCLUDES
AN ACTING COACH.

WE MAY NEVER
GET OUT OF HERE,

SO LET ME SAY THIS NOW
AND SAY IT QUICK.

I DON'T CARE IF YOUR MOTHER
WAS A RAINBOW TROUT.

AH, I GOT TO
TAKE THIS.

NO, I'M NOT BUSY.
WHAT'S GOING ON?

OK, QUICK, THROW ME
THE FORIAN CRYSTALS.

YOU GOT TWO HANDS,
GET THEM YOURSELF.

THEY'RE BETTER THAN
THE GARBAGE IN THIS SCRIPT.

WHO WROTE THIS,
A MONKEY WITH A COMPUTER?

YEAH, WE WOULD HAVE BEEN
BETTER OFF WITH THE MONKEY.

MIKAYLA, SWEETHEART,
WHAT ARE YOU DOING?

I TOLD YOU YOU COULDN'T
ACT LIKE A JERK UNTIL
YOUR SECOND MOVIE!

LISTEN, POP STAR, ONE MORE
OF YOUR LITTLE DIVA MOVES,

AND YOU'RE GONNA BE
OFF THIS MOVIE.

Mikayla:
GET YOUR HANDS OFF ME!

I'M THE STAR
OF THIS MOVIE!

DON'T LISTEN TO HER!
SHE'S A--A REAL ALIEN! AH!

TOLD YOU I'M BAD
AT THIS.

MILES, YOU MUST HAVE KNOWN
JAKE WAS GONNA FIND OUT
SOONER OR LATER.

WHAT IN THE WORLD
WERE YOU THINKING?

NO ONE WOULD BELIEVE
HER STORY,

AND JAKE WOULD SPEND
TWO MONTHS

SNUGGLING WITH A PENGUIN
IN ANTARCTICA.

BUT YOU KNOW, I'M NOT THE ONE
YOU NEED TO APOLOGIZE TO.

SURE, NOW HE LEAVES ME ALONE
WITH A BOY.

I CANNOT BELIEVE
WHAT YOU DID.

I GUESS I KIND OF
RUINED THE FRIENDSHIP
THING, HUH?

WELL, YOU SURE DIDN'T
DO IT A WHOLE LOT OF GOOD.

MILEY, IF YOU WERE JEALOUS,
WHY DIDN'T YOU JUST
SAY SOMETHING?

I WAS NOT JEALOUS.
OH, MILEY.

MAN, I MEAN, YOU DON'T
WANT TO BE A COUPLE,

AND WHEN I TRY
TO BE FRIENDS,

WHAT AM I GONNA DO
WITH YOU?

I DON'T KNOW.
MAYBE WE SHOULD JUST
FORGET ABOUT EACH OTHER!

OK, THIS ISN'T
WORKING FOR ME.

LOOK, LAST TIME,
YOU WERE THE ONE WITH
SOME GROWING UP TO DO.

BUT IF I PROMISE
NOT TO WRECK ANOTHER MOVIE,

CAN WE TRY TO BE
FRIENDS AGAIN?

THIS ISN'T HELPING
THE FRIENDSHIP THING.

I WAS JEALOUS AND STUPID,
AND I'M SORRY.

AND I'M JUST A SIDEKICK
WHO NEEDS TO LEARN
HOW TO SAY NO.

TRUTH IS, IF I
STILL LIKED A GUY,

I WOULD HAVE DONE
THE SAME THING.

WELL, I WOULD HAVE
DONE IT A LITTLE BETTER,

THAT WAS
SURPRISINGLY NICE OF YOU.

YOU KNOW WHAT?
I DON'T CARE IF
YOU'RE NOT FAMOUS.

I'M GONNA LET YOU
BE MY FRIEND.

REALLY, MIKAYLA,
YOU DON'T HAVE TO.

OH, MY GOODNESS,
THIS IS GONNA BE
SO MUCH FUN.

WE CAN DO ALL
MY FAVORITE THINGS:

AND TALK ABOUT
HOW MUCH I HATE
HANNAH MONTANA.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

CAPTIONED BY THE NATIONAL
CAPTIONING INSTITUTE
